name: FTOF::rawhits
info: reconstructed hit info from L/R FTOF PMTs

entries.name: energy_left_unc
entries.info: E dep unc (MeV) from L PMT

entries.name: energy_right_unc
entries.info: E dep unc (MeV) from R PMT

entries.name: time_left_unc
entries.info: Hit time unc (ns) from L PMT

entries.name: time_right_unc
entries.info: Hit time unc (ns) from R PMT

entries.name: x_unc
entries.info: Global X coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: y_unc
entries.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: z_unc
entries.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: tx
entries.info: Global X coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

entries.name: ty
entries.info: Global Y coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

entries.name: tz
entries.info: Global Z coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

entries.name: adc_idx1
entries.info: index of hit with ADCL in adc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: adc_idx2
entries.info: index of hit with ADCR in adc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: tdc_idx1
entries.info: index of hit with TDCL in tdc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: tdc_idx2
entries.info: index of hit with TDCR in tdc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: pathLength
entries.info: pathlength of the track from the vertex (doca point to the beamline to the midpoint between the entrance and exit of the hit bar

entries.name: pathLengthThruBar
entries.info: pathlength of the track from the entrance point to the exit point through the hit bar

entries.name: x_unc
entries.info: Global X coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: y_unc
entries.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: z_unc
entries.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: tx
entries.info: Global X coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

entries.name: ty
entries.info: Global Y coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

entries.name: tz
entries.info: Global Z coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

entries.name: adc_idx1
entries.info: index of hit with ADCL in adc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: adc_idx2
entries.info: index of hit with ADCR in adc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: tdc_idx1
entries.info: index of hit with TDCL in tdc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: tdc_idx2
entries.info: index of hit with TDCR in tdc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: pathLength
entries.info: pathlength of the track from the vertex (doca point to the beamline to the midpoint between the entrance and exit of the hit bar

entries.name: pathLengthThruBar
entries.info: pathlength of the track from the entrance point to the exit point through the hit bar

entries.name: component
entries.info: paddle id of FTOF hit with lowest paddle id in cluster

entries.name: energy_unc
entries.info: E dep unc (MeV) of the cluster

entries.name: x
entries.info: Global X coor (cm) of cluster hit

entries.name: y
entries.info: Global Y coor (cm) of cluster hit

entries.name: z
entries.info: Global Z coor (cm) of cluster hit

entries.name: x_unc
entries.info: Global X coor unc (cm)  of cluster hit

entries.name: y_unc
entries.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of cluster hit

entries.name: z_unc
entries.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of cluster hit

entries.name: paddle_id1A
entries.info: paddle id of hit with lowest paddle id in cluster for panel 1A

entries.name: paddle_id1B
entries.info: paddle id of hit with lowest paddle id in cluster for panel 1B

entries.name: tminAlgo_1B_tCorr
entries.info: corrected hit time using tmin algorithm to compute the path length between 1A and 1B

entries.name: midbarAlgo_1B_tCorr
entries.info: corrected hit time using middle of bar algorithm to compute the path length between 1A and 1B

entries.name: EmaxAlgo_1B_tCorr
entries.info: corrected hit time using Emax algorithm to compute the path length between 1A and 1B

name: CTOF::rawhits
info: reconstructed hit info from U/D CTOF PMTs

entries.name: energy_up_unc
entries.info: E dep unc (MeV) from U PMT

entries.name: energy_down_unc
entries.info: E dep unc (MeV) from D PMT

entries.name: time_up_unc
entries.info: Hit time unc (ns) from U PMT

entries.name: time_down_unc
entries.info: Hit time unc (ns) from D PMT

entries.name: x_unc
entries.info: Global X coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: y_unc
entries.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: z_unc
entries.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of hit

entries.name: tx
entries.info: Global X coor (cm) of hit from CVT info -trkID index

entries.name: ty
entries.info: Global Y coor (cm) of hit from CVT info - trkID index

entries.name: tz
entries.info: Global Z coor (cm) of hit from CVT info - trkID index

entries.name: adc_idx1
entries.info: index of hit with ADCU in adc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: adc_idx2
entries.info: index of hit with ADCD in adc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: tdc_idx1
entries.info: index of hit with TDCU in tdc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: tdc_idx2
entries.info: index of hit with TDCD in tdc bank, starts at zero

entries.name: pathLength
entries.info: pathlength of the track from the vertex (doca point to the beamline to the midpoint between the entrance and exit of the hit bar

entries.name: pathLengthThruBar
entries.info: pathlength of the track from the entrance point to the exit point through the hit bar
